events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and have started reviewing their resume and portfolio carefully.
The application has been categorized under Engineering since the candidate mentioned several years of experience as a software developer and devops engineer.
A recruiter has been assigned to the case to coordinate the next steps and communicate with the candidate regarding the technical interview scheduling.
Initial screening was completed and the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software development and cloud deployment strategies.
The candidate responded positively confirming availability for the technical interview and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity to join the engineering team.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th, providing adequate time for the candidate to prepare and the interviewers to plan the sessions.
